Articles.Content:
So, in this challenge you must make a sub! Why you ask? I don't know. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RULES

Sub must be able to ascend and descend

Sub must be able to move forward

It must be made in the SPH

----------------------------------------------

Thank you for entering! The sub I like most will, Look cool, go fast, and has a "special" touch to it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

The huge text is really unneccesary and you should at least read the challenge submission guide: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide)

Take a look at this one: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113743-Deep-Diver-Challenge%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113743-Deep-Diver-Challenge%21)

And maybe have a quick peek at [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide)
